page.title: 01THE CITY OF EDINBURGH,WEST
page.content: This information concerns a block of Edinburgh which begins approximately at Haymarket Station and extends past The Edinburgh Zoo. The land use is mainly Residential in the east but as we travel west we find an increase in open spaces such as Golf Courses, Public Parks and Recreational facilities. {Recreation and Leisure. } The Edinburgh Zoo. Golfing. Haymarket Station. Gorgie Farm. Murrayfield Stadium. The Modern Art Gallery. {Local History.} Blackhall,Edinburgh. Craigcrook castle. Water of Leith. {Education and Health.} Donaldsons School for The Deaf. Murrayfield,Beechmount and Corstorphine Hospitals.
